about_the_game:
The official game soundtrack to EARTH 2150!
This soundtrack features rousing and suspenseful music from the award-winning strategy trilogy: EARTH 2150 - Escape from the Blue Planet, The Moon Project and Lost Souls. Experience in 40 unique tracks and 19 remixes over 115 minutes enthralling acoustic moments, away from your PC, too.
Includes the Music Video "Escape from the Blue Planet".

Soundtrack composed and performed by Maciej Pawlowski, Studio Spot. Published by TopWare Interactive.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS

name: Earth 2150 Trilogy - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

This soundtrack features rousing and suspenseful music from the award-winning strategy trilogy: EARTH 2150 - Escape from the Blue Planet, The Moon Project and Lost Souls. Experience in 40 unique tracks and 19 remixes over 115 minutes enthralling acoustic moments, away from your PC, too.
